Quote.Author: John Donne
Quote.QuoteValue: For God's sake hold your tongue, and let me love

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: We first make our habits, and then our habits make us

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: He who would search for pearls must dive below

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: When I consider life, it is all a cheat. Yet fooled with hope, people favor this deceit

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: Boldness is a mask for fear, however great

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware the fury of a patient man

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: For they conquer who believe they can

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are but pictures of our thoughts

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is love's reward

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: Shame on the body for breaking down while the spirit perseveres

Quote.Author: John Dryden
Quote.QuoteValue: Only man clogs his happiness with care, destroying what is with thoughts of what may be

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as trying to analyze all the attention I received, I will leave that to others

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's something to see a satellite being launched from another satellite

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what you could say about a day in which you have seen four beautiful sunsets

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: I've seen John Wayne's 'True Grit' about 10 times

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear connotes something that interferes with what you're doing

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: The best space movie in my view is 'Apollo 13.' That's just the way it happened

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: In the old days, the Soviets were using space as a selling point for communism

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't oppose a women's astronaut training program; I just see no requirement for it

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: The political graveyards are full of people who don't respond

Quote.Author: John Glenn
Quote.QuoteValue: Any administration foolish enough to call ketchup a vegetable cannot be expected to cut the mustard

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: What a director should be doing is making it appear as though there was no script

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Why watch someone kissing when people really close their eyes when they kiss?

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of kids as a lower form of the human species

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: The only reason I got into movies was because I had no music talent

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: A nerd will be a nerd all his life

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be too cool. You get so caught up with whether you're doing it right

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't have this tortured childhood; I liked it

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm on a roll, and I finish a script at 3:00, I'll start another at 3:02

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather make music if I had the talent

Quote.Author: John Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'm making any great statements, and I certainly don't think I'm making art

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: The poetry of the earth is never dead

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: Heard melodies are sweet, but those unheard are sweeter

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: Now a soft kiss - Aye, by that kiss, I vow an endless bliss

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: Scenery is fine - but human nature is finer

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is my religion - I could die for it

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Beauty is truth, truth beauty,' - that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: Land and sea, weakness and decline are great separators, but death is the great divorcer for ever

Quote.Author: John Keats
Quote.QuoteValue: You are always new, the last of your kisses was ever the sweetest

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: Under capitalism, man exploits man. Under communism, it's just the opposite

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is the art of choosing between the disastrous and the unpalatable

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: The only function of economic forecasting is to make astrology look respectable

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: All successful revolutions are the kicking in of a rotten door

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: We all agree that pessimism is a mark of superior intellect

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: In the United States, though power corrupts, the expectation of power paralyzes

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: A person buying ordinary products in a supermarket is in touch with his deepest emotions

Quote.Author: John Kenneth Galbraith
Quote.QuoteValue: More die in the United States of too much food than of too little

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: The art challenges the technology, and the technology inspires the art

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're a director, you really live whatever you do

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot base a whole movie on just the imagery alone. It has to be the story and the characters

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: What I love about Goofy is the flesh on his cheeks. You can almost feel it

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: Art challenges technology, but technology inspires the art

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: Toys are put on this Earth to be played with by a child

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: True play is creativity

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: Short films really helped me develop as a story teller, animator, and as a director

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Cars' is simply near and dear to my heart

Quote.Author: John Lasseter
Quote.QuoteValue: Pixar is not about computers, it's about people

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: I played classical as a kid

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: Soul is about authenticity. Soul is about finding the things in your life that are real and pure

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always the front man for what I was doing from when I was 6

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: I think writers are prone to hyperbole sometimes

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is a great teacher

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: The best training is to play by ear: trial by fire

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: As a nation - and as a world - we need more truth

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a certain confidence that comes with being sure about the way the world works

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I like songs that have like a little bit of quirkiness to them

Quote.Author: John Legend
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to make fried chicken

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah we all shine on, like the moon, and the stars, and the sun

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the flower you've got to let grow

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: The more I see the less I know for sure

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of me suspects that I'm a loser, and the other part of me thinks I'm God Almighty

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: All you need is love

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing you can know that isn't known

Quote.Author: John Lennon
Quote.QuoteValue: If you tried to give rock and roll another name, you might call it 'Chuck Berry'

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up. Never give in. Never become hostile... Hate is too big a burden to bear

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Who gets the bird, the hunter or the dog?

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother and father and many of my relatives had been sharecroppers

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: The government, both state and federal, has a duty to be reasonable and accommodating

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You must be bold, brave, and courageous and find a way... to get in the way

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very hopeful. I am very optimistic about the future

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believe that all of us, as Americans... we all need to be treated like fellow human beings

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: We must continue to go forward as one people, as brothers and sisters

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing wrong with a little agitation for what's right or what's fair

Quote.Author: John Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading the Martin Luther King story, that little comic book, set me on the path that I'm on today

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: Education begins the gentleman, but reading, good company and reflection must finish him

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man has a property in his own person. This nobody has a right to, but himself

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason why men enter into society is the preservation of their property

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: All wealth is the product of labor

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortitude is the guard and support of the other virtues

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there is no property there is no injustice

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: Reverie is when ideas float in our mind without reflection or regard of the understanding

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: Parents wonder why the streams are bitter, when they themselves have poisoned the fountain

Quote.Author: John Locke
Quote.QuoteValue: The dread of evil is a much more forcible principle of human actions than the prospect of good

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: I like crazy people, especially those who don't see the risk

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: Live music is healthy

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought of Green Day as a punk band. Just bubblegum, really

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: I always find the mirror in the dressing room is where the best artists are

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, the genuine roots of culture is folk music

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: You'd have to be daft as a brush to say you didn't like Pink Floyd

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is 2 minutes and 52 seconds of squelching noises

Quote.Author: John Lydon
Quote.QuoteValue: You'll find that empty vessels make the most sound

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't worry about the horse being blind, just load the wagon

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: When your arm gets hit, the ball is not going to go where you want it to

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: The only yardstick for success our society has is being a champion. No one remembers anything else

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never eaten just a few bites of things I liked in my life

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: If you see a defense team with dirt and mud on their backs they've had a bad day

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: The road to Easy Street goes through the sewer

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: I think comparisons are odious

Quote.Author: John Madden
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the biggest gap in sports, the difference between the winner and the loser of the Super Bowl

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: I like design, I like details, to me it is just another form of self-expression

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure's a natural part of life

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: In New York in the Forties or Fifties, everybody's in a suit, an overcoat and a hat

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't lose my temper very often now, and if I do, it's well deserved

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to be fashionable

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: I am inspired by the appearance of a bohemian of the new millennium

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: Theater is so ephemeral, and I love that

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't physically attacked anyone in a couple of years

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what other people think. I don't think it matters

Quote.Author: John Malkovich
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't interfere with me, I'll always do something really good

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: They say stay in the lines, but there's always something better on the other side

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never done anything because I thought it would look cool

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it feels like my life is just one long day

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to think the best of me was still hiding up in my sleeve

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have anybody telling me what to do

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I may have taken someone through the wringer psychologically, but I've never been sinister

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: Trying to impress my mother with words was one of my favourite pursuits

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel my shows are like a late-night talk show that we settle down and do every night

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I lost my head for a little while

Quote.Author: John Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying everything I can not to be jaded 'cause I don't like jaded musicians

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: Ideas shape the course of history

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: The difficulty lies not so much in developing new ideas as in escaping from old ones

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: Long run is a misleading guide to current affairs. In the long run we are all dead

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: Education: the inculcation of the incomprehensible into the indifferent by the incompetent

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: Words ought to be a little wild, for they are the assaults of thoughts on the unthinking

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: In the long run we are all dead

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: Successful investing is anticipating the anticipations of others

Quote.Author: John Maynard Keynes
Quote.QuoteValue: The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just a thorn in everybody's side

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: Our mobile phones have become the greatest spy on the planet

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: I have dual citizenship; I would be happy to go to England. I would be very happy to go to America

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: Any idiot can make money. Keeping money, very few can do

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: I would describe myself as quite sane and lucid, which is why I'm still alive

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very hard to keep an uncrackable encryption if you share it with the government

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world are the ones who do

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: Steve Jobs would have wanted his words to change not just technology but politics itself

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: As the economy goes south, petty theft begins. And then grand theft. And then muggings

Quote.Author: John McAfee
Quote.QuoteValue: We as Americans have ripped off the world. We get to throw food away. It's insane

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody loves success, but they hate successful people

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing 'championship' about Wimbledon is its prestige

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's the mark of a great player to be confident in tough situations

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe there's only one autobiography you can do

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll let the racket do the talking

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you have any problems, other than that you're unemployed, a moron, and a dork?

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: This taught me a lesson, but I'm not quite sure what it is

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the better I used to be

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe it or not, I was a pretty shy youngster growing up

Quote.Author: John McEnroe
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a certain beauty and majesty to Wimbledon. The elegance, the way the grass looks on TV

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind is its own place and in itself, can make a Heaven of Hell, a Hell of Heaven

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep-versed in books and shallow in himself

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing profits more than self-esteem, grounded on what is just and right

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: To be blind is not miserable; not to be able to bear blindness, that is miserable

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: Who overcomes by force, hath overcome but half his foe

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: True it is that covetousness is rich, modesty starves

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: They also serve who only stand and wait

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth never comes into the world but like a bastard, to the ignominy of him that brought her birth

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: Let not England forget her precedence of teaching nations how to live

Quote.Author: John Milton
Quote.QuoteValue: For what can war, but endless war, still breed?

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pretty physically unsettling, living life on a visa

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I think puns are not just the lowest form of wit, but the lowest form of human behavior

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: The disconnect between America and its military is shocking

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a soccer player. I knew that couldn't happen

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't relax. I find vacations problematic

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: People in Britain see Richard Quest as a kind of an offensive cartoon character

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it hard in my general life to think further than the week ahead

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up, for me, is really more of an addiction, so you have to feed the beast whenever you can

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: You just try to be true to your idea of what is funny and what is also interesting

Quote.Author: John Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a great time to be doing political satire when the world is on a knife edge

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: God tests His people through hardship

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of faith is being satisfied with all that God is for us in Jesus

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't give God authority over your life. He has it, totally

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: Redemption is not perfection. The redeemed must realize their imperfections

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: God wills to be displayed and known and loved and cherished and worshiped

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in Him

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: The most dangerous thing in the world is the sin of self-reliance and the stupor of worldliness

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: One way to appreciate C.S. Lewis is to see how his Christian humility shaped his life and work

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: Blind people don't decide to see. Jesus says, 'See!' and they see

Quote.Author: John Piper
Quote.QuoteValue: Supernatural does not mean methodological stupidity

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: Mountains are the beginning and the end of all natural scenery

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: The purest and most thoughtful minds are those which love colour the most

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the first test of a truly great man is in his humility

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back

Quote.Author: John Ruskin
Quote.QuoteValue: Skill is the unified force of experience, intellect and passion in their operation

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a child of the 21st century

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: I want the traditional family upheld, but I don't want it upheld to the detriment of other people

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: It appears to be in the nature of religion itself to be prejudiced against those who are different

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: Mother Nature is not sweet

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that anything that begins to give people a sense of their own worth and dignity is God

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned early in life that you get places by having the right enemies

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: I experience God as the power of love

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: I can only give away the love that I have received

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: Inequality for gay and lesbian people is no longer a debatable issue in either church or state

Quote.Author: John Shelby Spong
Quote.QuoteValue: The way you become divine is to become wholly human

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: One can find so many pains when the rain is falling

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts... perhaps the fear of a loss of power

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: We spend our time searching for security and hate it when we get it

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: The discipline of the written word punishes both stupidity and dishonesty

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate cameras. They are so much more sure than I am about everything

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is the only kind of varmint sets his own trap, baits it, then steps in it

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: I've lived in good climate, and it bores the hell out of me. I like weather rather than climate

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless a reviewer has the courage to give you unqualified praise, I say ignore the bastard

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it

Quote.Author: John Steinbeck
Quote.QuoteValue: A sad soul can kill quicker than a germ

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: He who knows only his own side of the case knows little of that

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: Men might as well be imprisoned, as excluded from the means of earning their bread

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: Conservatives are not necessarily stupid, but most stupid people are conservatives

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: The disease which inflicts bureaucracy and what they usually die from is routine

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: Originality is the one thing which unoriginal minds cannot feel the use of

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: Pleasure and freedom from pain, are the only things desirable as ends

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: One person with a belief is equal to ninety-nine who have only interests

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not aware that any community has a right to force another to be civilized

Quote.Author: John Stuart Mill
Quote.QuoteValue: The despotism of custom is everywhere the standing hindrance to human advancement

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: The essential self is innocent, and when it tastes its own innocence knows that it lives for ever

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans have been conditioned to respect newness, whatever it costs them

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Any activity becomes creative when the doer cares about doing it right or better

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Inspiration arrives as a packet of material to be delivered

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is like baby shoes. When you coat them with gold, they can no longer be worn

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: We are most alive when we're in love

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Being naked approaches being revolutionary; going barefoot is mere populism

Quote.Author: John Updike
Quote.QuoteValue: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner
